name: project mnemosyne
description:
A narrative space filled with memories from subject 260894aadf.
Presented to you by Aurora, the Data Archeologist who found the files and it's intertwined past.

Bachelor project from Aurel Fischer at the HSLU Lucerne institute of Camera Arts.
